        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> makeExchange(ICard card,

        Checks if the player has clicked cards before. If this is the third card that is clicked
        Parameters:
        card - last card clicked.
        currentPlayer - current player.
        Returns:
        names of the provinces connected to the cards if a correct combination has been chosen, null otherwise
